attributes.action: to stop the driving test for the over 65:70 it’s picking on older people
attributes.background: Kick out the driving test for old people as this  is picking on the older drivers who are safe it’s the younger drivers that cause the problem this government should stop picking on the pensioners we are good and safe

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure what driving test you are referring to.
